deposit().details: Deposit native S currency and receive Origin Sonic (OS) tokens in return. Will verify that the user is sent 1:1 for S.

returns._0: Amount of Origin Sonic (OS) tokens sent to user

depositSForWrappedTokens(uint256).details: Deposit S and receive Wrapped Origin Sonic (wOS) in return

params.minReceived: min amount of Wrapped Origin Sonic (wOS) to receive

returns._0: Amount of Wrapped Origin Sonic (wOS) tokens sent to user

depositWSForWrappedTokens(uint256,uint25.details: Deposit Wrapped Sonic (wS) tokens and receive Wrapped Origin Sonic (wOS) tokens in return

params.minReceived: min amount of Wrapped Origin Sonic (wOS) token to receive
params.wSAmount: Amount of Wrapped Sonic (wS) to deposit

returns._0: Amount of Wrapped Origin Sonic (wOS) tokens sent to user
